attributes.action: BBC axing channels, ruduce the licence fee!
attributes.additional_details:
The BBC are reducing channels (BBC 3) however we shall remain to pay the same fee for reduced services.

If the BBC are to reduce the channels, they clearly require less funding from the licence fees.

Let's all sign this to ensure we are not 'ripped off' by the BBC and Government for an unnecessary fee!

rejection.details: This is an operational matter for the BBC.
